name: Roopayan
briefDescription: ROOPAYAN is a national, not-for-profit organization registered under the Societies Registration Act, XXI of 1860, in March 2008.Roopayan aims to promote gender equity and the fulfillment of children's rights through the use of communication and mass media developed for, with and by children.  Roopayan has been set up with the belief that ‘Education is the cornerstone of all development’. At Roopayan, we work with stories, tales and fables. Each story of Roopayan features a meaningful relevance to life of children. The process, using stories, helps children to acquire empowering life skills while developing their reading skills. In last four years, Roopayan has covered over 60,000 schools across 12 states including Uttrakhand, Uttar Pradesh
